column5: dissociation is what I suffer from the most
Wow man what a way of thinking,
Thanks man really appreciate every word that you have written it means alot
Wow that's is absolutely a cheer me up , thanks
Thanks alot your right I dont need answers,  I just need some to adapt to the fact that I dont have the answers

Will i dont think the timing is right for her to take the hijab off when she is capable of being independent and have a jop and her own place i might advise her to do so she will be harmed if she took it off living in the uae and at our parents place
I can only imagine it is
When do you think you will be able to go out without hijab , if you dont mind me asking

Will I have been kicked out like 8 times , the last time it was for approximately 1 year it was the longest so as an expert on this field,  just make sure if you do get kicked out that you have a solid plan if not wait until you do , until that solid plan comes along just try and have things your own way by lieing your ass off , my last advice is if you did get kicked out dont shut the door forever on coming back home by saying or doing something stupid.
May I ask how old were you when you discovered it
Will today I did take a step I sayed that I left islam and I sayed it loud and clear , thanks for your words
Thanks somehow I feel like what you wrote is gonna help me later on in life , Im a happy person always have been and will try to stay happy
Your  words mean so much , can i ask you though how was your since of reality was it effected?
Will i haven't had the pleasure of meeting any
